name: Door Jam
description:
Door Jam is a fun and fast rhythm game all about attacking doors until they open. The aim of the game is to press respective input buttons while the electric zaps pass through the light boxes and the exposed cable to send a signal to the guy to attack the door. Otherwise, if they reach him, he'll get electrocuted! Try to hit them as soon as they enter the boxes for bonus points!

CONTROLS

Use any letter key you choose to hit the electric zaps. The top row of letter keys corresponds to the highest row of the cables. The middle row of letter keys corresponds to the middle row of the cables. And the bottom row of letter keys corresponds to the lowest row of the cables.

Notice - This game features fast flashing lights that may cause discomfort and/or seizures for those with photosensitive conditions
